New Records: Papua New Guinea scored 129/9 in 20 overs
Jatinder Singh remained not out on 73
Key Match Events: Oman won the match by 10 wickets
Zeeshan Maqsood was the pick of the Oman bowlers with 4/20
Post-Match Reflections: Papua New Guinea's players discussed their performance and need for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the opening match of the tournament
Oman's win put them in a strong position for the Super 12 stage
Others: Match 1 of the ICC World Twenty20 2021
